trans-unit.source: Install Azure BizTalk Services SDK
trans-unit.target: Install Azure BizTalk Services SDK

trans-unit.source: Steps to install <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: Steps to install <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> has three main components: Developer SDK, <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime, and <token>powershell</token> cmdlet Tools.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> has three main components: Developer SDK, <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime, and <token>powershell</token> cmdlet Tools.

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: In this topic:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Service SDK Components Explained
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Service SDK Components Explained

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the components within the <token>af_integration</token> SDK, and lists what gets installed:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the components within the <token>af_integration</token> SDK, and lists what gets installed:

trans-unit.source: Component
trans-unit.target: Component

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Developer SDK
trans-unit.target: Developer SDK

trans-unit.source: Download BizTalk Services SDK
trans-unit.target: Download BizTalk Services SDK

trans-unit.source: Download schemas
trans-unit.target: Download schemas

trans-unit.source: On the <legacyBold>Development</legacyBold> computer with <token>vsprvs</token>, the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK is installed to develop and design your <token>af_integration</token> applications.
trans-unit.target: On the <legacyBold>Development</legacyBold> computer with <token>vsprvs</token>, the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK is installed to develop and design your <token>af_integration</token> applications.

trans-unit.source: The Developer SDK automatically installs:
trans-unit.target: The Developer SDK automatically installs:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service</embeddedLabel> project template in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>xml_bridge</token>s.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service</embeddedLabel> project template in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>xml_bridge</token>s.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service Artifacts</embeddedLabel> project template in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>transform</token>s and schemas.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service Artifacts</embeddedLabel> project template in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>transform</token>s and schemas.

trans-unit.source: <token>bap</token> 2013: Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.
trans-unit.target: <token>bap</token> 2013: Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.

trans-unit.source: Installs the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions.
trans-unit.target: Installs the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK: Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK: Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Server Explorer plug-in in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s used by the <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Server Explorer plug-in in <token>vsprvs</token> to create <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s used by the <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Using Internet Information Services (IIS), the <ui>Runtime</ui> computer manages connectivity between your <token>af_integration_full</token> applications and the on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) applications.
trans-unit.target: Using Internet Information Services (IIS), the <ui>Runtime</ui> computer manages connectivity between your <token>af_integration_full</token> applications and the on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) applications.

trans-unit.source: If your applications use an on-premises LOB system, then you must install the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime on a computer with IIS and internet access.
trans-unit.target: If your applications use an on-premises LOB system, then you must install the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime on a computer with IIS and internet access.

trans-unit.source: If your application does <legacyUnderline>not</legacyUnderline> connect to an on-premises LOB system, then you do <legacyUnderline>not</legacyUnderline> need to install the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime.
trans-unit.target: If your application does <legacyUnderline>not</legacyUnderline> connect to an on-premises LOB system, then you do <legacyUnderline>not</legacyUnderline> need to install the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime.

trans-unit.source: This option automatically installs:
trans-unit.target: This option automatically installs:

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel> : Runs on-premises and uses WCF web services to manage the communication between the on-premises LOB systems and the <token>af_integration</token> applications.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel> : Runs on-premises and uses WCF web services to manage the communication between the on-premises LOB systems and the <token>af_integration</token> applications.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK : Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token> 2013
trans-unit.target: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK : Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token> 2013

trans-unit.source: <token>bap</token> 2013 : Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.
trans-unit.target: <token>bap</token> 2013 : Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions are installed.
trans-unit.target: On a 64-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions are installed.

trans-unit.source: On a 32-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit version is installed.
trans-unit.target: On a 32-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit version is installed.

trans-unit.source: Windows Communication Foundation HTTP Activation feature (.NET Framework 3.5)
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation HTTP Activation feature (.NET Framework 3.5)

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET 4.5 feature (.NET Framework 4.5)
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4.5 feature (.NET Framework 4.5)

trans-unit.source: Internet Information Services (IIS) feature, including:
trans-unit.target: Internet Information Services (IIS) feature, including:

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET 3.5
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 3.5

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET 4.5
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 4.5

trans-unit.source: CGI
trans-unit.target: CGI

trans-unit.source: ISAPI Extensions
trans-unit.target: ISAPI Extensions

trans-unit.source: ISAPI Filters
trans-unit.target: ISAPI Filters

trans-unit.source: Windows Authentication
trans-unit.target: Windows Authentication

trans-unit.source: Windows Process Activation Service feature
trans-unit.target: Windows Process Activation Service feature

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Components</link> describes the architecture.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Components</link> describes the architecture.

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: <ui>Tools</ui> includes the Windows PowerShell cmdlets to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime components and your deployed <token>af_integration</token> applications.
trans-unit.target: <ui>Tools</ui> includes the Windows PowerShell cmdlets to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime components and your deployed <token>af_integration</token> applications.

trans-unit.source: Tools automatically installs:
trans-unit.target: Tools automatically installs:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Windows PowerShell</embeddedLabel> extensions to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime and the <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Windows PowerShell</embeddedLabel> extensions to manage the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime and the <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK : Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token> 2013.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft WCF LOB Adapter SDK : Required by the Microsoft <token>bap</token> 2013.

trans-unit.source: <token>bap</token> 2013 : Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.
trans-unit.target: <token>bap</token> 2013 : Used if your <token>af_integration</token> application sends messages to on-premises line-of-business (LOB) systems including SAP, SQL Server, Siebel, Oracle Database, or Oracle E-Business Suite.

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions are installed.
trans-unit.target: On a 64-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit and 64-bit versions are installed.

trans-unit.source: On a 32-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit version is installed.
trans-unit.target: On a 32-bit computer, the <token>bap</token> 32-bit version is installed.

trans-unit.source: The <token>bap</token> is automatically included with <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>bap</token> is automatically included with <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: There is no separate installation or license needed.
trans-unit.target: There is no separate installation or license needed.

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.

trans-unit.source: As a result, PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.
trans-unit.target: As a result, PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the EULA is available in the Setup folder.
trans-unit.target: A copy of the EULA is available in the Setup folder.

trans-unit.source: It can be printed.
trans-unit.target: It can be printed.

trans-unit.source: Software Requirements
trans-unit.target: Software Requirements

trans-unit.source: Setup is separated into three environments: Development, Runtime, and Tools.
trans-unit.target: Setup is separated into three environments: Development, Runtime, and Tools.

trans-unit.source: The environments can be configured on a single computer or separate computers.
trans-unit.target: The environments can be configured on a single computer or separate computers.

trans-unit.source: For a complete installation, set up the <token>vsprvs</token> development and the <token>lobconnect</token> runtime/tools environments on the same computer.
trans-unit.target: For a complete installation, set up the <token>vsprvs</token> development and the <token>lobconnect</token> runtime/tools environments on the same computer.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the software requirements to install the <token>af_integration_full</token> environments on different computers:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the software requirements to install the <token>af_integration_full</token> environments on different computers:

trans-unit.source: Software
trans-unit.target: Software

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Computer
trans-unit.target: Computer

trans-unit.source: Operating System
trans-unit.target: Operating System

trans-unit.source: Can be any of the following:
trans-unit.target: Can be any of the following:

trans-unit.source: Windows 7
trans-unit.target: Windows 7

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

trans-unit.source: Windows 8
trans-unit.target: Windows 8

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012

trans-unit.source: <token>vs2012</token> requires Windows 7 and Windows 2008 R2 <externalLink><linkText>Service Pack 1</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=252370</linkUri></externalLink> to be installed.
trans-unit.target: <token>vs2012</token> requires Windows 7 and Windows 2008 R2 <externalLink><linkText>Service Pack 1</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=252370</linkUri></externalLink> to be installed.

trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: Required versions include:
trans-unit.target: Required versions include:

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>.NET Framework 3.5.1</legacyBold>:
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>.NET Framework 3.5.1</legacyBold>:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server : Open <ui>Server Manager</ui>, select <ui>Features</ui>, and select <ui>.NET Framework 3.5</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server : Open <ui>Server Manager</ui>, select <ui>Features</ui>, and select <ui>.NET Framework 3.5</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Windows 7/Windows 8 : Open <ui>Control Panel</ui>, select <ui>Programs And Features</ui>, select <ui>Turn Windows Feature On or Off</ui>, and select <ui>Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Windows 7/Windows 8 : Open <ui>Control Panel</ui>, select <ui>Programs And Features</ui>, select <ui>Turn Windows Feature On or Off</ui>, and select <ui>Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5</ui>.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>.NET Framework 4.5</legacyBold>:
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>.NET Framework 4.5</legacyBold>:

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2/Windows 7 : Download <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=242919</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2/Windows 7 : Download <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=242919</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012/Windows 8 : In <ui>Features</ui>, select <ui>.NET Framework 4.5 Advanced Services</ui>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012/Windows 8 : In <ui>Features</ui>, select <ui>.NET Framework 4.5 Advanced Services</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: Microsoft <token>vsprvs</token> 2012
trans-unit.target: Microsoft <token>vsprvs</token> 2012

trans-unit.source: Microsoft <token>csprcs</token> .NET is the minimum requirement.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft <token>csprcs</token> .NET is the minimum requirement.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Installing Visual Studio</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2h7fzkw(v=vs.110).aspx</linkUri></externalLink> provides more information.

trans-unit.source: <token>vsprvs</token> 2012 Express editions (Web/Desktop) are not supported for <token>af_integration</token> SDK.
trans-unit.target: <token>vsprvs</token> 2012 Express editions (Web/Desktop) are not supported for <token>af_integration</token> SDK.

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: LOB Server client libraries
trans-unit.target: LOB Server client libraries

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> requires the LOB Server client libraries to communicate with the LOB systems.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> requires the LOB Server client libraries to communicate with the LOB systems.

trans-unit.source: So wherever you install the <token>lobconnect</token>, also install the LOB client libraries.
trans-unit.target: So wherever you install the <token>lobconnect</token>, also install the LOB client libraries.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t use or need the <token>lobconnect</token>, then you don’t need to install the LOB Server client libraries.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t use or need the <token>lobconnect</token>, then you don’t need to install the LOB Server client libraries.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Server 2013 Installation Guides</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=269582</linkUri></externalLink> provides more specific details on what client libraries are required and where to install them from.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Server 2013 Installation Guides</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=269582</linkUri></externalLink> provides more specific details on what client libraries are required and where to install them from.

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> namespace
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> namespace

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> uses the <token>sb2</token> namespace and the <token>sb2</token> Issuer Name/Issuer Key values.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> uses the <token>sb2</token> namespace and the <token>sb2</token> Issuer Name/Issuer Key values.

trans-unit.source: When you create the LOB connections in your <token>vsprvs</token> project, you enter these values.
trans-unit.target: When you create the LOB connections in your <token>vsprvs</token> project, you enter these values.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh690931.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>How To: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/hh690931.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer is used to access the <token>tpm_full</token>, which can be from any computer with internet access.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer is used to access the <token>tpm_full</token>, which can be from any computer with internet access.

trans-unit.source: Supported Internet Explorer versions include:
trans-unit.target: Supported Internet Explorer versions include:

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 9 desktop
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 9 desktop

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 10 desktop
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 10 desktop

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer 11 desktop
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 11 desktop

trans-unit.source: The <token>tpm_full</token> uses Silverlight.
trans-unit.target: The <token>tpm_full</token> uses Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: The Modern Browser versions of Internet Explorer are not supported.
trans-unit.target: The Modern Browser versions of Internet Explorer are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: Internet access
trans-unit.target: Internet access

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime starts a relay endpoint on <token>sb1</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime starts a relay endpoint on <token>sb1</token>.

trans-unit.source: The computer and the account that runs the IIS website must have access to the Internet through the firewall.
trans-unit.target: The computer and the account that runs the IIS website must have access to the Internet through the firewall.

trans-unit.source: Depending on your network requirements, you may need to install the Forefront TMG Client at <externalLink><linkText>Forefront Threat Management Gateway (TMG) Client</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=303843</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your network requirements, you may need to install the Forefront TMG Client at <externalLink><linkText>Forefront Threat Management Gateway (TMG) Client</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=303843</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The TMG Client also supports ISA Server 2004 and ISA Server 2006.
trans-unit.target: The TMG Client also supports ISA Server 2004 and ISA Server 2006.

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections
trans-unit.target: HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections

trans-unit.source: To connect to your namespace, HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections is required.
trans-unit.target: To connect to your namespace, HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections is required.

trans-unit.source: By default, HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections is enabled.
trans-unit.target: By default, HTTP 1.1 through Proxy connections is enabled.

trans-unit.source: It can be enabled in Internet Explorer Options (Advanced tab), a domain group policy or enabling HTTP 1.1 on the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: It can be enabled in Internet Explorer Options (Advanced tab), a domain group policy or enabling HTTP 1.1 on the proxy server.

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Required to use the Windows PowerShell cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Required to use the Windows PowerShell cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Installation options:
trans-unit.target: Installation options:

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Windows Server 2008 R2/Windows 7</legacyBold> : Download <externalLink><linkText>Windows Management Framework 3.0</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=251995</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Windows Server 2008 R2/Windows 7</legacyBold> : Download <externalLink><linkText>Windows Management Framework 3.0</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=251995</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Windows Server 2012/Windows 8</legacyBold> : Automatically included with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Windows Server 2012/Windows 8</legacyBold> : Automatically included with the operating system.

trans-unit.source: There is no separate installation.
trans-unit.target: There is no separate installation.

trans-unit.source: Tools
trans-unit.target: Tools

trans-unit.source: Install BizTalk Services SDK
trans-unit.target: Install BizTalk Services SDK

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>BEFORE YOU INSTALL</legacyBold>:
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>BEFORE YOU INSTALL</legacyBold>:

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Close all instances of <token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Close all instances of <token>vsprvs</token></legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Terminate any MsBuild.exe processes; which can be done using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: Terminate any MsBuild.exe processes; which can be done using Task Manager.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Update machine.config</legacyBold>: In previous <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK versions, you may have updated the machine.config file manually or by using <legacyItalic>RelayConfigurationInstaller.exe /i</legacyItalic>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Update machine.config</legacyBold>: In previous <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK versions, you may have updated the machine.config file manually or by using <legacyItalic>RelayConfigurationInstaller.exe /i</legacyItalic>.

trans-unit.source: If you updated the machine.config file, run <legacyItalic>RelayConfigurationInstaller.exe /u</legacyItalic> to remove the entries from the machine.config.
trans-unit.target: If you updated the machine.config file, run <legacyItalic>RelayConfigurationInstaller.exe /u</legacyItalic> to remove the entries from the machine.config.

trans-unit.source: The RelayConfigurationInstaller tool is available with your previous SDK version and the December 2012 Release.
trans-unit.target: The RelayConfigurationInstaller tool is available with your previous SDK version and the December 2012 Release.

trans-unit.source: You must use the RelayConfigurationInstaller tool that shipped with your previous SDK version.
trans-unit.target: You must use the RelayConfigurationInstaller tool that shipped with your previous SDK version.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Upgrade</legacyBold>: You can run Setup to upgrade from a Preview version to the latest SDK version.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Upgrade</legacyBold>: You can run Setup to upgrade from a Preview version to the latest SDK version.

trans-unit.source: If you prefer a fresh installation, uninstall any previous versions of the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and the <token>lobconnect</token>.
trans-unit.target: If you prefer a fresh installation, uninstall any previous versions of the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and the <token>lobconnect</token>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Uninstall" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Removing the BizTalk Services SDK and BizTalk Adapter Service</link> lists the uninstall steps.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Uninstall" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Removing the BizTalk Services SDK and BizTalk Adapter Service</link> lists the uninstall steps.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Recommended installation</legacyBold>: A recommended installation spans at least two computers: Development and Runtime/Tools.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Recommended installation</legacyBold>: A recommended installation spans at least two computers: Development and Runtime/Tools.

trans-unit.source: When these components are installed on different computers, all the computers must be in a trusted network.
trans-unit.target: When these components are installed on different computers, all the computers must be in a trusted network.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Runtime is optional</legacyBold>: If your <token>af_integration</token> application does not connect to an on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) system, then you do not need the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Runtime is optional</legacyBold>: If your <token>af_integration</token> application does not connect to an on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) system, then you do not need the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Install test certificate</legacyBold>: When you create a BizTalk Service using the <token>azportal</token>, a test certificate is automatically created and can be downloaded from the <token>azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Install test certificate</legacyBold>: When you create a BizTalk Service using the <token>azportal</token>, a test certificate is automatically created and can be downloaded from the <token>azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this certificate when installing the Runtime.
trans-unit.target: You can use this certificate when installing the Runtime.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="c3b8d534-fc79-4203-8f09-cd3ac3510675" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">APPENDIX: BizTalk Services Certificates Overview</link> lists the steps to install the certificate on your local computer.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="c3b8d534-fc79-4203-8f09-cd3ac3510675" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">APPENDIX: BizTalk Services Certificates Overview</link> lists the steps to install the certificate on your local computer.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Open TCP port</legacyBold>: If you install the Runtime, it creates a web site in IIS that is bound to port 8080 (by default).
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Open TCP port</legacyBold>: If you install the Runtime, it creates a web site in IIS that is bound to port 8080 (by default).

trans-unit.source: On the IIS server, port 8080 must opened within any firewall.
trans-unit.target: On the IIS server, port 8080 must opened within any firewall.

trans-unit.source: If you use Windows Firewall, create a new Inbound Rule on TCP port 8080.
trans-unit.target: If you use Windows Firewall, create a new Inbound Rule on TCP port 8080.

trans-unit.source: Steps listed at <externalLink><linkText>How to create a Windows Firewall Inbound Rule</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/mandi/archive/2014/11/03/how-to-create-a-windows-firewall-inbound-rule.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Steps listed at <externalLink><linkText>How to create a Windows Firewall Inbound Rule</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/mandi/archive/2014/11/03/how-to-create-a-windows-firewall-inbound-rule.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Tools</legacyBold> can be installed on any computer (including multiple computers) that uses the <token>powershell</token> cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Tools</legacyBold> can be installed on any computer (including multiple computers) that uses the <token>powershell</token> cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: INSTALL STEPS
trans-unit.target: INSTALL STEPS

trans-unit.source: Log in with an account that is a member of the local Administrators group.
trans-unit.target: Log in with an account that is a member of the local Administrators group.

trans-unit.source: If installing the <legacyBold>Runtime</legacyBold>, the account must also have administrative privileges on the IIS instance where you install the Runtime.
trans-unit.target: If installing the <legacyBold>Runtime</legacyBold>, the account must also have administrative privileges on the IIS instance where you install the Runtime.

trans-unit.source: Install the <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Reqs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Software Requirements</link>.
trans-unit.target: Install the <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Reqs" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Software Requirements</link>.

trans-unit.source: Run the 32-bit or 64-bit <legacyBold>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</legacyBold> as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Run the 32-bit or 64-bit <legacyBold>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</legacyBold> as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: If User Account Control is enabled, an alert to install may display.
trans-unit.target: If User Account Control is enabled, an alert to install may display.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Yes</embeddedLabel> and proceed with the installation.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Yes</embeddedLabel> and proceed with the installation.

trans-unit.source: Accept the license agreement and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Accept the license agreement and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Developer SDK</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel>, and/or <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> depending on your needs.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Developer SDK</embeddedLabel>, <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel>, and/or <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> depending on your needs.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Components" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">BizTalk Service SDK Components Explained</link> lists the differences.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Components" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">BizTalk Service SDK Components Explained</link> lists the differences.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> lists the Setup actions.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> lists the Setup actions.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: For a fresh installation, the Setup action is <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: For a fresh installation, the Setup action is <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: If some components are already installed, <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> lists the versions and the Setup action; like <embeddedLabel>None</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Upgrade</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: If some components are already installed, <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> lists the versions and the Setup action; like <embeddedLabel>None</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Upgrade</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Upgrade" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade from Preview to General Availability (GA)</link> provides more information.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Upgrade" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade from Preview to General Availability (GA)</link> provides more information.

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>If you select Runtime</legacyBold>, the <token>lobconnect</token> setup starts:
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>If you select Runtime</legacyBold>, the <token>lobconnect</token> setup starts:

trans-unit.source: Select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold> on the Welcome page.
trans-unit.target: Select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold> on the Welcome page.

trans-unit.source: Accept the license agreement and select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Accept the license agreement and select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: For the Application Pool, enter an identity that has Internet access and select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: For the Application Pool, enter an identity that has Internet access and select <legacyBold>Next</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> application pool in IIS is created and executes as this identity.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> application pool in IIS is created and executes as this identity.

trans-unit.source: Internet access is needed because this identity is used to access the relay endpoints on the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: Internet access is needed because this identity is used to access the relay endpoints on the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Azure BizTalk Services Deployment Details</embeddedLabel>, enter the <token>af_integration</token> deployment URL, and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Azure BizTalk Services Deployment Details</embeddedLabel>, enter the <token>af_integration</token> deployment URL, and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: This URL is used to ascertain the artifact store associated with your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: This URL is used to ascertain the artifact store associated with your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for <token>lobconnect</token> components you create, such as <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s, are stored in the artifact store.
trans-unit.target: The configuration settings for <token>lobconnect</token> components you create, such as <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s, are stored in the artifact store.

trans-unit.source: Select the certificate bindings for the <token>lobconnect</token> website and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select the certificate bindings for the <token>lobconnect</token> website and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Use SSL to secure the management service</embeddedLabel>: Select this option to encrypt the HTTP requests with SSL.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Use SSL to secure the management service</embeddedLabel>: Select this option to encrypt the HTTP requests with SSL.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Select an existing SSL certificate</embeddedLabel>: Select this option to select an existing certificate from the Certificates store.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Select an existing SSL certificate</embeddedLabel>: Select this option to select an existing certificate from the Certificates store.

trans-unit.source: The certificate should be from a trusted certificate authority.
trans-unit.target: The certificate should be from a trusted certificate authority.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Port</embeddedLabel>: Enter the port number for the <token>lobconnect</token> website.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Port</embeddedLabel>: Enter the port number for the <token>lobconnect</token> website.

trans-unit.source: By default, port 8080 is entered.
trans-unit.target: By default, port 8080 is entered.

trans-unit.source: Confirm the port is open in your firewall.
trans-unit.target: Confirm the port is open in your firewall.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: When the wizard completes, select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel> to go back to the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK wizard.
trans-unit.target: When the wizard completes, select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel> to go back to the <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK wizard.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel> to complete the installation and exit the wizard.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel> to complete the installation and exit the wizard.

trans-unit.source: When the installation completes, a setup log file is created in the user’s temp directory at C:\Users\<legacyItalic>UserName</legacyItalic>\AppData\Local\Temp.
trans-unit.target: When the installation completes, a setup log file is created in the user’s temp directory at C:\Users\<legacyItalic>UserName</legacyItalic>\AppData\Local\Temp.

trans-unit.source: If the installation fails, refer to this log file for any errors.
trans-unit.target: If the installation fails, refer to this log file for any errors.

trans-unit.source: If the installation succeeds, you have an environment with all the components needed to create and/or manage <token>af_integration</token> applications.
trans-unit.target: If the installation succeeds, you have an environment with all the components needed to create and/or manage <token>af_integration</token> applications.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade BizTalk Services SDK to the latest version
trans-unit.target: Upgrade BizTalk Services SDK to the latest version

trans-unit.source: You can upgrade the Developer, Runtime, and Tools components from <token>af_integration_full</token> Preview or <token>af_integration_full</token> (November 2013) General Availability (GA) to the latest version.
trans-unit.target: You can upgrade the Developer, Runtime, and Tools components from <token>af_integration_full</token> Preview or <token>af_integration_full</token> (November 2013) General Availability (GA) to the latest version.

trans-unit.source: To upgrade, run <embeddedLabel>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</embeddedLabel> as Administrator, select the components you want to upgrade, and continue with the setup.
trans-unit.target: To upgrade, run <embeddedLabel>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</embeddedLabel> as Administrator, select the components you want to upgrade, and continue with the setup.

trans-unit.source: The Setup detects the versions of the previous installed components, and suggests upgrading them accordingly.
trans-unit.target: The Setup detects the versions of the previous installed components, and suggests upgrading them accordingly.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you must have all the three components installed with the same version.
trans-unit.target: Typically, you must have all the three components installed with the same version.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have Developer SDK and Runtime installed of one version, and the Tools component installed of another version, the setup would recommend that all the components should be of the same version.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you have Developer SDK and Runtime installed of one version, and the Tools component installed of another version, the setup would recommend that all the components should be of the same version.

trans-unit.source: During the upgrade, your existing artifacts are upgraded to GA, including <token>msgflow_proj</token> artifacts, <token>transform</token>s, and <token>lobconnect</token> components.
trans-unit.target: During the upgrade, your existing artifacts are upgraded to GA, including <token>msgflow_proj</token> artifacts, <token>transform</token>s, and <token>lobconnect</token> components.

trans-unit.source: Also, if you choose to upgrade the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime component, the setup also performs a migration of <token>lobconnect</token> settings from an on-premises SQL Server database to <token>azure_1</token> storage.
trans-unit.target: Also, if you choose to upgrade the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime component, the setup also performs a migration of <token>lobconnect</token> settings from an on-premises SQL Server database to <token>azure_1</token> storage.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Migrate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Migrate the BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Environment</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8#BKMK_Migrate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Migrate the BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Environment</link>.

trans-unit.source: Post Upgrade
trans-unit.target: Post Upgrade

trans-unit.source: After you upgrade to the latest version, do the following:
trans-unit.target: After you upgrade to the latest version, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Redeploy EDI Agreements that have Batching enabled.
trans-unit.target: Redeploy EDI Agreements that have Batching enabled.

trans-unit.source: If Batching is not used in the Agreement, there is no need to redeploy the EDI Agreement.
trans-unit.target: If Batching is not used in the Agreement, there is no need to redeploy the EDI Agreement.

trans-unit.source: The BizTalk Adapter Service Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.
trans-unit.target: The BizTalk Adapter Service Windows PowerShell module name is Microsoft.BizTalk.Adapter.Services.Powershell.dll.

trans-unit.source: As a result, PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.
trans-unit.target: As a result, PowerShell scripts written using the Preview-version of the cmdlets may fail after upgrading.

trans-unit.source: These scripts must be rewritten.
trans-unit.target: These scripts must be rewritten.

trans-unit.source: Refer to <link xlink:href="8fb45528-57eb-45ba-886b-6513da2fe296" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure BizTalk Services - Release Notes</link> for additional issues that can occur after upgrading.
trans-unit.target: Refer to <link xlink:href="8fb45528-57eb-45ba-886b-6513da2fe296" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure BizTalk Services - Release Notes</link> for additional issues that can occur after upgrading.

trans-unit.source: As a best practice, create a backup of the BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: As a best practice, create a backup of the BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> provides more information on creating a backup.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=329873</linkUri></externalLink> provides more information on creating a backup.

trans-unit.source: Migrate the BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Environment
trans-unit.target: Migrate the BizTalk Adapter Service Runtime Environment

trans-unit.source: The Preview and the November 2013 GA version of <token>lobconnect</token> component, available as part of <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK, required an on-premises SQL Server database for storing information about <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s.
trans-unit.target: The Preview and the November 2013 GA version of <token>lobconnect</token> component, available as part of <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK, required an on-premises SQL Server database for storing information about <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s.

trans-unit.source: The February 2014 version of the <token>lobconnect</token> component stores the information in the repository associated with <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: The February 2014 version of the <token>lobconnect</token> component stores the information in the repository associated with <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK setup enables you to migrate the information stored in the on-premises SQL Server database to the <token>azure_1</token> storage associated with <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK setup enables you to migrate the information stored in the on-premises SQL Server database to the <token>azure_1</token> storage associated with <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: The following steps provide information on how to perform the migration:
trans-unit.target: The following steps provide information on how to perform the migration:

trans-unit.source: You can perform the migration along with the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: You can perform the migration along with the upgrade.

trans-unit.source: On a computer that has a previous version of <token>lobconnect</token> installed, run the <legacyBold>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</legacyBold> as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: On a computer that has a previous version of <token>lobconnect</token> installed, run the <legacyBold>WindowsAzureBizTalkServicesSetup.exe</legacyBold> as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: If User Account Control is enabled, an alert to install may display.
trans-unit.target: If User Account Control is enabled, an alert to install may display.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Yes</embeddedLabel> and proceed with the installation.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Yes</embeddedLabel> and proceed with the installation.

trans-unit.source: Accept the license agreement and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Accept the license agreement and select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel> and then select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Runtime</embeddedLabel> and then select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> page lists that the Runtime (<token>lobconnect</token>) component will be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>Summary</embeddedLabel> page lists that the Runtime (<token>lobconnect</token>) component will be upgraded.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Next</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: On the <embeddedLabel>Migration</embeddedLabel> page, provide the URL for your <token>af_integration</token> subscription, Access Control namespace associated with <token>af_integration</token>, and the issuer name/issuer key for the Access Control namespace.
trans-unit.target: On the <embeddedLabel>Migration</embeddedLabel> page, provide the URL for your <token>af_integration</token> subscription, Access Control namespace associated with <token>af_integration</token>, and the issuer name/issuer key for the Access Control namespace.

trans-unit.source: The setup uses the URL to ascertain the repository associated with your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: The setup uses the URL to ascertain the repository associated with your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for <token>lobconnect</token> components you create, such as <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s, are stored in the repository associated with <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: The configuration settings for <token>lobconnect</token> components you create, such as <token>lobrelay</token>s and <token>lobtarget</token>s, are stored in the repository associated with <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: If you used <token>lobconnect</token> as part of your existing <token>af_integration</token> applications created using the Preview or November 2013 GA version of the SDK, the wizard migrates the <token>lobconnect</token> configuration settings from the local SQL Server database to the repository associated with the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you used <token>lobconnect</token> as part of your existing <token>af_integration</token> applications created using the Preview or November 2013 GA version of the SDK, the wizard migrates the <token>lobconnect</token> configuration settings from the local SQL Server database to the repository associated with the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Install</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: After the wizard completes, select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: After the wizard completes, select <embeddedLabel>Finish</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Remove BizTalk Services SDK
trans-unit.target: Remove BizTalk Services SDK

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token> can be uninstalled using the Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK and <token>lobconnect</token> can be uninstalled using the Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Uninstall a Program</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Uninstall a Program</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Uninstall or change a program</embeddedLabel> page, right-click the component, and select <embeddedLabel>Uninstall</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Uninstall or change a program</embeddedLabel> page, right-click the component, and select <embeddedLabel>Uninstall</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The complete list of the installed components includes:
trans-unit.target: The complete list of the installed components includes:

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK

trans-unit.source: Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>
trans-unit.target: Microsoft <token>lobconnect</token>

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> Tools
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> Tools

trans-unit.source: Microsoft <token>bap</token>, if installed
trans-unit.target: Microsoft <token>bap</token>, if installed

trans-unit.source: Microsoft <token>bap</token> (x64), if installed
trans-unit.target: Microsoft <token>bap</token> (x64), if installed

trans-unit.source: Windows Communication Foundation LOB Adapter SDK (WCF LOB Adapter SDK), if installed
trans-unit.target: Windows Communication Foundation LOB Adapter SDK (WCF LOB Adapter SDK), if installed

trans-unit.source: Always uninstall the <token>bap</token> before you uninstall the WCF LOB Adapter SDK.
trans-unit.target: Always uninstall the <token>bap</token> before you uninstall the WCF LOB Adapter SDK.
